translations: v．被征召入伍：指强制某人加入军队或其他国家组织。
· He was conscripted into the army.

sentences.sentence: He was conscripted into the U.S. army.
He was conscripted into the army in 1939.
Qaddafi never seemed to shut up, and Libyans were his conscripted audience.
sentences.translation: 卡扎菲似乎从不闭嘴，利比亚人则是被召集来的听众。
